meanings.definition: A protein found in the retina that is sensitive to light and is involved in color vision.
meanings.sent1: The iodopsin in the retina helps us see different colors.
meanings.sent2: Scientists study iodopsin to understand how we perceive colors.
meanings.sent3: The iodopsin in the eye decided to throw a colorful party for the other proteins.
meanings.sent4: Her vision was as clear as iodopsin under a bright light.
meanings.sent5: The vibrant hues of the rainbow were as vivid as iodopsin in the eye.
